states.title: Intro and Scene 1
states.performerText:
Action: Once the introduction is finished, the interactive media automatically plays. The Appetizer is served at this time.

Guests eat and finish the Appetizer. Once the table is cleared, trigger the next scene.

Description: A fixed-length media plays that give an introduction to the experience and what to expect.

Interactive media then plays and loops until manually triggered.

states.title: Finale and Outro
states.performerText:
Action: At the beginning of the interactive media, serve the Dessert.

Description: A fixed-length scene plays for the finale of the dinner. This gives an introduction for the Dessert. The interactive media will loop until manually stopped/reset.

states.title: Welcome
states.performerText:
Action: Appetizer is ready to serve. Once guests are seated and ready, trigger the next scene. 

Description: Branded media loops while the guests sit and get ready.

states.title: Scene 2 and 3
states.performerText:
Action: At the beginning of the interactive media, serve the Entree. When the guests finish the Entree, clear the table then trigger the Finale.


Description:
The media plays in a fixed-length scene. The interactive scene is automatically started. The Entree is then served.
